quoteText:
If you are under the Minimum Age (as defined for your region in Section 14) you may not register for an account.
Unless you are the holder of an existing account in the United States that is a Yahoo <u>Family Account</u>, you must be at least the Minimum Age to use the Services.
Certain portions of the Services contain adult and/or mature content.
Please do not access that content unless you are an adult (i.e., at least the age of majority in your country) or unless otherwise expressly indicated.
title: This service is only available to users over a certain age

tosdr.case: This service is only available to users over a certain age
